Reviews.Title: very disappointed
Reviews.Author: MackNSlap
Reviews.Content: Very disappointed, received the phone with hardware issues, not all the buttons worked. Software issues, had to be brought into a service center to be worked on, also didn't receive an AC charging adapter. Would have returned it if I trusted the seller the least bit. Awful, first bad purchase through Amazon, definitely makes me doubt if I should make any further purchases through Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Cortez "tez"
Reviews.Content: The phone is in perfect co diction....co RS with all those stickers covering screen and in original box!!!!extremely happy. Make sure u order phones from this sller

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: nicolas marin
Reviews.Content: recommend product is very good and so far has worked very well I loved it.  It is good and comes well protected
